Where Knowledge Is Key
One thing to do with your brain
Tell Me More

Structure

Three Phase Study Process

Learn

During the week you will gather information and share here what you have found. You will do use cases of code from what you have learned

Collaborate

Each Saturday we will come together and share what we have learned during the week and if there is code, we will do code reviews to learn from what others have done.

Projects

At the beginning of the month it will be determined what type of project each person will do. At the end of the month those projects will be presented.

Studies

Each month we will select a book or topic from a book that we will study for that month

Ruby

Metaprogramming

Roadmap

Here we will keep a roadmap of the books that we have studied over the course of time.

  • October 2104

    Ruby

    Ruby is an interpreted, object-oriented, dynamically typed language from a family of so-called scripting languages.

Ruby

Ruby is an interpreted, object-oriented, dynamically typed languagefrom a family of so-called scripting languages. We will learn for one month the power of Ruby and put together a project based off of this scripting language.

  • Book: Seven Language in Seven Weeks
  • Book Month: October 2014
  • Category: Programming Languages
